casebody.data:
Blanford Ray STOKES and Henry Davis Stokes, Appellants, v. UNITED STATES, Appellee. No. 11617. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 23, 1946. Joe Sid Mize, of Forest, Miss., for appellants. Toxey Hall, U. S. Atty., and Robert E. Hauberg, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Jackson, Miss., for appellee.

Before SIBLEY, HOLMES, and WALLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

An examination of the record reveals no reversible error and the judgment of the lower Court is affirmed.
